mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.user_id, a.user_name, a.utm_id, a.utm_name, a.order_code, a.borrow_nid, a.borrow_period, a.invest_amount, a.invest_time, a.reg_time, CASE WHEN ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender bt WHERE bt.user_id = a.user_id AND bt.addtime < a.invest_time ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(assign_id) FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender ct WHERE ct.user_id = a.user_id AND ct.add_time < concat(a.invest_time) ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_borrow_tender_cpn bc WHERE bc.user_id = a.user_id AND bc.addtime < a.invest_time ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_hjh_accede ha WHERE ha.user_id = a.user_id AND ha.add_time < a.invest_time ), 0 ) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END is_first FROM ( SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.nid AS order_code, ten.borrow_nid, CASE WHEN b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, ten.account AS invest_amount, ten.addtime AS invest_time FROM huiyingdai_utm_reg t INNER JOIN huiyingdai_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_borrow_tender ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id AND ten.accede_order_id IS NULL INNER JOIN huiyingdai_borrow b ON ten.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid where 1=1
AND u.reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{regStartTime})
AND u.reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{regEndTime})
AND ten.addtime >= unix_timestamp(#{timeStartSrch})
AND ten.addtime <= unix_timestamp(#{timeEndSrch})
UNION ALL SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.accede_order_id AS order_code, ten.plan_nid AS borrow_nid, CONCAT( b.debt_lock_period, '个月' ) AS borrow_period, ten.accede_account AS invest_amount, ten.create_time AS invest_time FROM huiyingdai_utm_reg t INNER JOIN huiyingdai_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_debt_plan_accede ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_debt_plan b ON ten.plan_nid = b.debt_plan_nid where 1=1
AND u.reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{regStartTime})
AND u.reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{regEndTime})
AND ten.create_time >= unix_timestamp(#{timeStartSrch})
AND ten.create_time <= unix_timestamp(#{timeEndSrch})
UNION ALL SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.assign_nid AS order_code, CONCAT('HZR', ten.credit_nid) AS borrow_nid, CONCAT(b.credit_term, '天') AS borrow_period, ten.assign_capital AS invest_amount, ten.add_time AS invest_time FROM huiyingdai_utm_reg t INNER JOIN huiyingdai_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_credit_tender ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_borrow_credit b ON ten.credit_nid = b.credit_nid where 1=1
AND u.reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{regStartTime})
AND u.reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{regEndTime})
AND ten.add_time >= unix_timestamp(#{timeStartSrch})
AND ten.add_time <= unix_timestamp(#{timeEndSrch})
) AS a ) mm
ORDER BY mm.invest_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.user_id, a.user_name, a.utm_id, a.utm_name, a.order_code, a.borrow_nid, a.borrow_period, a.invest_amount, a.invest_time, a.reg_time, CASE WHEN ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender bt WHERE bt.user_id = a.user_id AND bt.addtime < a.invest_time ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(assign_id) FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender ct WHERE ct.user_id = a.user_id AND ct.add_time < concat(a.invest_time) ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_borrow_tender_cpn bc WHERE bc.user_id = a.user_id AND bc.addtime < a.invest_time ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_hjh_accede ha WHERE ha.user_id = a.user_id AND ha.add_time < a.invest_time ), 0 ) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END is_first FROM ( SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.accede_order_id AS order_code, ten.plan_nid AS borrow_nid, CASE WHEN hhp.is_month = '1' THEN CONCAT(hhp.lock_period, '个月') ELSE CONCAT(hhp.lock_period, '天') END AS borrow_period, ten.accede_account AS invest_amount, ten.create_time AS invest_time FROM huiyingdai_utm_reg t INNER JOIN huiyingdai_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_hjh_accede ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_hjh_plan hhp ON ten.plan_nid = hhp.plan_nid where 1=1
AND u.reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{regStartTime})
AND u.reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{regEndTime})
AND ten.create_time >= unix_timestamp(#{timeStartSrch})
AND ten.create_time <= unix_timestamp(#{timeEndSrch})
) AS a ) mm
ORDER BY mm.invest_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT a.user_id, a.user_name, a.utm_id, a.utm_name, a.order_code, a.borrow_nid, a.invest_amount, a.invest_time, a.reg_time, CASE WHEN ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender bt WHERE bt.user_id = a.user_id AND bt.addtime < a.invest_time ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(assign_id) FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender ct WHERE ct.user_id = a.user_id AND ct.add_time < concat(a.invest_time) ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_borrow_tender_cpn bc WHERE bc.user_id = a.user_id AND bc.addtime < a.invest_time ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_hjh_accede ha WHERE ha.user_id = a.user_id AND ha.add_time < a.invest_time ), 0 ) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END is_first FROM ( SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.nid AS order_code, ten.borrow_nid, ten.account AS invest_amount, ten.addtime AS invest_time FROM huiyingdai_utm_reg t INNER JOIN huiyingdai_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_borrow_tender ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id AND ten.accede_order_id IS NULL INNER JOIN huiyingdai_borrow b ON ten.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid where 1=1
AND u.reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{regStartTime})
AND u.reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{regEndTime})
AND ten.addtime >= unix_timestamp(#{timeStartSrch})
AND ten.addtime <= unix_timestamp(#{timeEndSrch})
UNION ALL SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.accede_order_id AS order_code, ten.plan_nid AS borrow_nid, ten.accede_account AS invest_amount, ten.create_time AS invest_time FROM huiyingdai_utm_reg t INNER JOIN huiyingdai_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_debt_plan_accede ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_debt_plan b ON ten.plan_nid = b.debt_plan_nid where 1=1
AND u.reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{regStartTime})
AND u.reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{regEndTime})
AND ten.create_time >= unix_timestamp(#{timeStartSrch})
AND ten.create_time <= unix_timestamp(#{timeEndSrch})
UNION ALL SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.assign_nid AS order_code, CONCAT('HZR', ten.credit_nid) AS borrow_nid, ten.assign_capital AS invest_amount, ten.add_time AS invest_time FROM huiyingdai_utm_reg t INNER JOIN huiyingdai_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_credit_tender ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_borrow_credit b ON ten.credit_nid = b.credit_nid where 1=1
AND u.reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{regStartTime})
AND u.reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{regEndTime})
AND ten.add_time >= unix_timestamp(#{timeStartSrch})
AND ten.add_time <= unix_timestamp(#{timeEndSrch})
) AS a ) mm

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT a.user_id, a.user_name, a.utm_id, a.utm_name, a.order_code, a.borrow_nid, a.invest_amount, a.invest_time, a.reg_time, CASE WHEN ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender bt WHERE bt.user_id = a.user_id AND bt.addtime < a.invest_time ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(assign_id) FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender ct WHERE ct.user_id = a.user_id AND ct.add_time < concat(a.invest_time) ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_borrow_tender_cpn bc WHERE bc.user_id = a.user_id AND bc.addtime < a.invest_time ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_hjh_accede ha WHERE ha.user_id = a.user_id AND ha.add_time < a.invest_time ), 0 ) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END is_first FROM ( SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.accede_order_id AS order_code, ten.plan_nid AS borrow_nid, ten.accede_account AS invest_amount, ten.create_time AS invest_time FROM huiyingdai_utm_reg t INNER JOIN huiyingdai_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN huiyingdai_users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_hjh_accede ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_hjh_plan hhp ON ten.plan_nid = hhp.plan_nid where 1=1
AND u.reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{regStartTime})
AND u.reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{regEndTime})
AND ten.create_time >= unix_timestamp(#{timeStartSrch})
AND ten.create_time <= unix_timestamp(#{timeEndSrch})
) AS a ) mm
